data.name: ورئیز
data.description: Weriz is a powerful marketing platform which equips businesses with a set of professionally selected marketing tools & enables them to promote their business with zero-commission and no extra effort, through a smartly engineered, smooth & easy process.   Meanwhile, we take care of the customer experience within Weriz with great care and passion, so that users have a joyous time searching for whatever products or services they require or are interested in, all within a few simple taps.
